list_definition.definition: the act of introducing, or the process of being introduced
an act of introducing one person to another

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The hostess made the introductions and everyone shook hands.

list_definition.definition: something written at the beginning of a book explaining the contents, or said at the beginning of a speech etc.
